about_the_game:
Turn heads at the pool with bright and playful swimwear from The Sims™ 4 Poolside Splash Kit. The colorful patterns and trendy cuts of this collection were designed to complement a variety of skin tones and body types.

KEY FEATURES
  • Vivacious and Vibrant — Whether your Sim is looking to get flirty in the hot tub or party by the pool, these lively looks will help them stand out. Mix and match for uniquely dazzling results.

  • Aquatic Accessories — Complete your poolside ensemble with stylish shades, rainbow nails, sandals, fabulous floaties, and more! Indulge your sense of fun.
